about.title: About
about.summary: Each one of us can participate in solving social/environmental issues. It's not only about big deeds, but also small everyday contributions. I want to do so by bringing in my expertise in UX/UI design and passion for creative problem solving... see more

school.name: Addis Ababa University
school.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts, Graphic Design
school.description: During my undergraduate studies at Addis Ababa University, I pursued a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree with a specialization in Graphic Design. This comprehensive program provided me with a strong foundation in design principles, typography, visual communication, and creative problem-solving... see more

form.credential_hint: Can include your degrees, certificates, online courses
form.education_description: During my undergraduate studies at Addis Ababa University, I pursued a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree with a specialization in Graphic Design. This comprehensive program provided me with a strong foundation in design principles, typography, visual communication, and creative problem-solving.
form.unregistered_organization_warning: Addis Ababa University is not a registered organization. Confirm your information and send your request.
form.forgot_information: I don’t remember my exact information
form.employer_request_info: Your employer will be requested to fill in these details.
form.unregistered_organization_request: Addis Ababa University is not a registered organization. Confirm your information and send a request to verify your experience.
form.verification_letter: Dear Addis Ababa University Registrar Department, My name is Umaya Nigina, and I was born on January 14, 1990. I am a proud graduate of Addis Ababa University, having received my Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design on June 28, 2014. I am writing to formally request verification of my education and the issuance of a digital credential. Thank you for your time and assistance with this matter. Sincerely, Umaya Nigina
form.bfa_graphic_design: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design
form.credentials_info: Here are all your credentials issued or requested.

credential.title: Educational Certificate
credential.additional_info_example: The Alle School of Fine Arts and Design Summa Cum Laude with Distinction in Graphic Design
credential.additional_info_hint: Please add any other information such as grade, faculty, and departments, etc...
credential.education_verified_info: Umaya’s education at Addis Ababa University has been verified.
credential.vc_request_received: Umaya received VC request on Socious Wallet
credential.request_approved: Has approved your request and issued you a digital certificate. Claim now.
credential.blockchain_technology_info: Socious uses blockchain technology to make credentials transparent and traceable.
credential.claim_certificate_info: By claiming your certificate, you maintain full control and ownership of your credentials. You can easily share them with employers, educational institutions, or anyone else who requires proof of your qualifications directly from your digital wallet.
instructions: Accept the invitation to receive your certificate
credential.verification_check: Abebech Desta from Addis Ababa University is checking Umaya’s request on Socious.
credential.credential_claimed_info: Abebech Desta from Addis Ababa University is checking if Umaya has accepted her credential
credential.verify_experience_request: To verify your experience and request credentials, we need to verify your identity.
credential.achievements_transparency_info: This means your achievements are transparent and verifiable by anyone. To make this work, we need to confirm you are the rightful owner of the credentials you're requesting. This verification helps prevent fraud and protects the value of your credentials. We leverage digital ID technology to verify your identity without storing your personal details.
identity_verification_steps: Complete the app's onboarding process, which will create a digital ID on the blockchain.
Verify your identity with Veriff, our partner for identity verification.
credential.identity_verification_info_short: To receive verifiable credentials you need to verify your identity.
credential.profile_verification_success: Congratulations! Your profile has been successfully verified
credential.request_certificates_info: You can now request digital certificates.
credential.veriff_credential_sharing: Umaya shares her Veriff credential with Socious app
credential.choose_credential: Choose the credential you would like to share:
credential.confirm_information: Confirm the information below to send your request to Addis Ababa University.
credential.heading_send_verification_request: Send verification request to existing organization
credential.verification_achievements_info: This means your achievements are transparent and verifiable by anyone. To make this work, we need to confirm you are the rightful owner of the credentials you're requesting. This verification helps prevent fraud and protects the value of your credentials. We leverage the power of digital ID technology to verify your identity without storing your personal details.
credential.verification_steps: Go through the app’s onboarding process which will create a decentralized ID on Atala Prism. Verify your identity with Veriff, our KYC partner.
credential.no_work_certificate: If there is no corresponding work certificate claimed. (this includes certificate statuses like: “pending”, “declined”, “withdrawn”, “issued” etc.
credential.show_after_certificate_claimed: Show only after the certificate is claimed, after this, Umaya can’t edit (except description). Rationale, if Umaya edits the info, the modified info is not verified
credential.request_pending_approval: The request is pending approval from OP (missing information or not when Umaya clicks “I don’t remember my exact information”)
credential.work_certificate_issued: The work certificate has been issued and is claimable by Umaya
credential.credential_revoked: The credential has been revoked (outside the scope for now)
credential.approval_moves_to_issued_tab: Note: once a credential request is approved it moves to Issued tab
credential.issued_credentials_archive: Note: only issued credentials can be moved to archive
credential.op_request_pending: The request is pending approval from OP
credential.credential_sent_to_umaya: The credential has been sent to Umaya
